name: Beep & Boop
description:
Beep & Boop

This game is our Game Jam submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.
This time the theme was "Stronger Together".

Our idea was to let the player control two characters that have to help each other to solve  puzzles, but with the twist that the player only directly controls one character.

In Beep & Boop you take control of Beep.
Beep and its buddy, Boop, have been damaged. Beep has lost its body and Boop its head. So beep can't interact with things and Boop can't see.

Help them through the labs in search of new parts to repair themselves!

- This game supports controllers and have been tested with a dualshock 4 on windows.

Known bugs:
- The laser can sometimes trigger objects directly to the right of Boop when spawning  thereby triggering sensors.
- Falling can sometimes cause the level to re-reload. It doesn't do much except look silly

We hope you enjoy our game!

This game is our first attempt at a game jam and we are pretty happy with the result!
Every asset and every line of code has been made by us.
Graphics and animations were made by Ida
Code, music and sound was made by Mathias
